title: update from 5.0.6 to 5.0.7 failed
body:
i overwrite all files with scp, open the browser and go to my owncloud. updater says ok, everything is fine:

aktualisiere owncloud auf version 5.0.7. dies kã¶nnte eine weile dauern.

turned on maintenance mode
updated database
turned off maintenance mode

the update was successful. redirecting you to owncloud now.

and than i got the update loop. the same steps appears every time now.

### steps to reproduce
1. overwrite all files
2. open the browser
3. start the update

### server configuration
operating system: debian 7 wheezy

web server: apache 2.2

database: mysql 5.5.31

php version: 5.4.15

owncloud version: 5.0.6

### client configuration
browser: firefox and chrome (newest versions)

operating system: linux mint 15

### logs
#### web server error log

all is fine here.

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
insert your owncloud log here
{"app":"core","message":"starting upgrade from 5.0.8 to 5.0.12","level":2,"time":1370730078}
{"app":"core","message":"starting upgrade from 5.0.8 to 5.0.12","level":2,"time":1370730079}
{"app":"core","message":"starting upgrade from 5.0.8 to 5.0.12","level":2,"time":1370730081}
{"app":"core","message":"starting upgrade from 5.0.8 to 5.0.12","level":2,"time":1370730084}
{"app":"core","message":"starting upgrade from 5.0.8 to 5.0.12","level":2,"time":1370730085}
